item.title: Human experience for Transhuman
item.description: -- Human experience for Transhuman Speculative Design | 2018, Academic Work | ONGOING Concept Human experience for Transhuman in 2075 Not to forget “human” emotion, transhuman children wear the device in their head. This suspends their implanted AI and They can think “as human”. Transhuman children go to transhuman-only school and this experience is taught in the “human history” class. User’s Manual Settings What kind of tools are used by children who were born transhuman in the age of post-singularity?
